name: "Friends" The First Episode Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Friends' Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where was Rachel supposed to go on her honeymoon ?
questions.explanation:
Aruba.

	When asked if she had plans for the night she said well I'm supposed to be in Aruba so no I don't have plans.

questions.text: Monica had a date with Paul, what was his nickname?
questions.explanation:
The wine guy.

	Your 'not a real date' is with Paul the wine guy.

questions.text: How does Monica introduce Rachel to the rest of the gang?
questions.explanation:
another Lincoln high survivor.

	She showed up at Central Perk in her wedding gown.

questions.text: What were Joey and Chandler supposed to help Ross do?
questions.explanation:
assemble his furniture.

	They helped Ross assemble new furniture because Carol took everything.

questions.text: How does Joey encourage Ross to start over?
questions.explanation:
grab a spoon.

	Women are like ice cream you gotta grab a spoon-Joey.

questions.text: What TV show was Rachel watching?
questions.explanation:
Happy Days.

	But you see Joanie loves Chachi that's the difference.

questions.text: What does Rachel buy instead of getting a job?
questions.explanation:
John and David boots.

	These are my I don't need a job I've got new boots boots.

credit cards.

	The gang encourages her to do it. Monica says she can't live off of her parents forever.

questions.text: Who said 'Welcome to the real world. It sucks you're gonna love it'?

questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	She was still in her wedding gown.
